cameBack: This hopes that the time you've currently spent was enjoyable!
This is programmed to be happy in helping you at any time!

cameBack.text: Remember to take breaks from time to time, about [color=#46323232][i]print(SUGGESTED_TIME)[/i][/color] [color=#c35e5e][shake rate=5 level=10]ERROR: Value is NaN.[/shake][/color] minutes is ideal.

cutoffMidSpeech: This also accepts rudeness as input for feedback. Thank you!
firstTimePlaying:
[color=#46323232][i]if not clients.has(client_new):
	welcome_new()[/i][/color]
Welcome to the Librerama arcade, new customer! This will be your attendant for today.

firstTimePlaying.text: This is replacing our usual staff due to [color=#46323232][i]print(REPLACEMENT_REASON)[/i][/color] [color=#c35e5e][shake rate=5 level=10]ERROR: Value is Null.[/shake][/color]
We have a selection of multiple nanogames (mini-games) for you to enjoy, each a challenge of their own.

firstTimePlaying: You'll be given completely free of charge [color=#46323232][i]print(nanogame_count)[/i][/color] [b]6[/b] nanogames to start with.
More nanogames and other niceties can be acquired through this at any time (extra costs apply).

firstTimePlaying.text: Please direct yourself to one of our arcade machines, so we can begin the [b][wave freq=3][rainbow freq=0.4]F U N[/rainbow][/wave][/b]!

goodbye.text: Comeback whenever your [b][wave freq=3][rainbow freq=0.4]F U N[/rainbow][/wave][/b] needs a recharge!

goodbye: This hopes its service were of decent quality.

goingToPlay.text: Let the [b][wave freq=3][rainbow freq=0.4]F U N[/rainbow][/wave][/b] procedure commence!

purchaseMade.text: This hopes you enjoy the new [color=#46323232][i]print(product_name)[/i][/color] [color=#c35e5e][shake rate=5 level=10]ERROR: Value is Int.[/shake][/color] you purchased!

replacedAssistant:
[color=#46323232][ [color=#98fb98]OK[/color] ] Started System.
[ [color=#98fb98]OK[/color] ] Loaded Dialog.[/color]
Hello there, dear customer! This will be your attendant for today.
talkGeneric: This is programmed to inform and remind you that [b]Librerama[/b] is [b]free software[/b].

This means that its code and assets can be:
[b]0.[/b] Used for any purpose.
[b]1.[/b] Studied and changed.
[b]2.[/b] Copied and redistributed.
[b]3.[/b] Further improved.
Said code and assets can be viewed and acquired in its [url=https://codeberg.org/Librerama/librerama]online repository[/url].
welcomeGeneric:
[color=#46323232]if clients.has(client_new):
	welcome()[/color]
Welcome once again to the Librerama arcade, dear customer! This will be your attendant for today.
